description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for one (1) 1.8 Staffing Consultant, Senior to provide support to the Chief of the Defence Staff (CDS) in their development of recommendations for promotions to and within the General Officer / Flag Officer (GOFO) ranks, through the conduct and summary of candidate interviews.
full_summary:
=================
### GOFO Third Party External Interviews Request for Proposal

**Notice Title:** GOFO Third Party External Interviews
**Reference Number:** PW-23-01021564
**Date of Publication:** January 16, 2023
**Closing Date:** January 31, 2023
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Project Description:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites bids for a contract to support the Chief of the Defence Staff (CDS) in developing recommendations for promotions to and within the General Officer / Flag Officer (GOFO) ranks. The selected bidder will be responsible for conducting and summarizing external candidate interviews to inform CDS recommendations.

**Contract Duration:** The contract period is expected to commence from the date of award and will continue until March 31, 2025. There is an option to extend the contract by up to three additional one-year periods, subject to the same conditions.

**Required Services:**

* Conducting and summarizing external candidate interviews for promotions to and within the GOFO ranks
* Providing support to the CDS in developing recommendations for promotions
* Meeting security requirements, as outlined in Part 6 of the bid solicitation

**Security Requirements:**

* Bidders must comply with the Contract Security Program (CSP) of Public Services and Procurement Canada and provide the required information as detailed in article 2.3 of Part 2 of the bid solicitation.
* For further information, please refer to the CSP website at https://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/esc-src/introduction-eng.html.

**Language of Bid:**

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contact Information:**

For more information, please contact Lana Ibrahim, Department of National Defence at LANA.IBRAHIM@forces.gc.ca. Do not hesitate to contact us if you require any clarification on the bid solicitation.
